game.name: Quasis: The Last Eclipse
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Quasis is an isometric party based RPG with action elements that takes you on a journey across dimensions! Survive the post apocalyptic wasteland, invade the corporate cyber-space, and infiltrate the augmented-reality pseudo-utopia!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Quasis is an isometric party based RPG with action elements that takes you on a journey across dimensions! Survive the post apocalyptic wasteland, invade the corporate cyber-space, and infiltrate the augmented-reality pseudo-utopia!
